resources.string: CyanogenMod Installer
Unsupported tablet
Unsupported phone

Sorry, your tablet is not currently supported by the CyanogenMod Installer.

For more information please check the supported device list.

You may continue to prepare your tablet for installation at your own risk.

Sorry, your phone is not currently supported by the CyanogenMod Installer.

For more information please check the supported device list.

You may continue to prepare your phone for installation at your own risk.
Continue Anyway
Welcome

This app will assist you as you install the CyanogenMod experience. You will need a Windows PC running Vista or newer, and a USB cable.\n\nYour tablet will be factory reset during this process, so please ensure important data is backed up before continuing.

This app will assist you as you install the CyanogenMod experience. You will need a Windows PC running Vista or newer, and a USB cable.\n\nYour phone will be factory reset during this process, so please ensure important data is backed up before continuing.
Begin
Continue
Continue installation in Windows
Unplug your tablet
Unplug your phone
To proceed, enable USB Debugging on the next screen as shown below.
To proceed, enable Camera (PTP) on the next screen as shown below.
Your tablet is now prepared for CyanogenMod installation. Visit the website below on your Windows PC to continue:
Your phone is now prepared for CyanogenMod installation. Visit the website below on your Windows PC to continue:
Your tablet has been successfully detected by the CyanogenMod installer. Congratulations! To continue, return to the CyanogenMod Installer on your Windows PC and follow the instructions.
Your phone has been successfully detected by the CyanogenMod installer. Congratulations! To continue, return to the CyanogenMod Installer on your Windows PC and follow the instructions.
http://get.cm
Unplug your tablet from your computer to continue the installation process.\n\nDo not plug in your tablet again until prompted to by the Windows installer.
Unplug your phone from your computer to continue the installation process.\n\nDo not plug in your phone again until prompted to by the Windows installer.
To proceed, please disable Fast Boot on the next screen as shown below.
I Agree
Warning!

DO NO TRANSLATE THIS YET: Installing CyanogenMod will completely replace your tablet's operating system, and in rare cases, this may cause your tablet to become nonfunctional.

But we've worked very hard to make sure that the installation is as reliable and safe as possible.

By continuing, you understand the potential risks.

DO NO TRANSLATE THIS YET: Installing CyanogenMod will completely replace your phone's operating system, and in rare cases, this may cause your phone to become nonfunctional.

But we've worked very hard to make sure that the installation is as reliable and safe as possible.

By continuing, you understand the potential risks.
